website_summaries.verdict: With beefed-up audio features, the Creative Live Cam Voice is one of the best overall cameras for IM and Internet-based voiceconferencing.
cons: Noise is visible in still and moving images
fast movement in video looks blurry
must switch the driver to use video effects
features launch in separate windows instead of one main interface

customer_reviews.title: Really great,  EXCEPT!
customer_reviews.text: Got my wonderful Creative webcam, proudly installed the software, uninstalled the software, installed the software, uninstalled the software. Anyway you get the idea. Not put off by dumb machines, I tried several changes in the default layout. It seems the layout the Creative believes is the living end, AIN'T! I had to change it to AVI and the Intel Indedo video compresser and changed the audio compresser to MPEG layer-3. Best it's little heart, within range it follows me around when I move in the chair, keeping me centered in the picture. I like that. I was this close to sending it back (*) because I had a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Live Cam
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece when she went away to college. It arrived on time and in excellent condition. It proved to be very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: i like this
customer_reviews.text: thankyou i like this cam with voice for my computer next time i will buy more for this cam with voice and save more money thankyou.
customer_reviews.author: minh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to say
customer_reviews.text: My image on my screen is very sharp,however on the other side of transmission the picture is some what blured ( pixelated). The problem could be other then the quality of the Live Cam itselfe. G
customer_reviews.author: Gideon

customer_reviews.title: Customer Review
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera, it is very simple and picture quality is very good and its a good camera for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Kumar Papade

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: In image quality point of view, it is not something special. You can have the same image quality by purchasing a webcame for much much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Bako F.

customer_reviews.title: A camera that is easy to install and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera we tried another by a well known company and the software and camera did not work with our operating systems. The camera had so many quirks we could never get it working. I am not a computer expert and I got this thing up and running with no problems. I would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SKP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Bad
customer_reviews.text: Webcam does not get detected most of times. Even though it is detected, the webcam does not show the picture. System has to be restarted to show up the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great audio quality......
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why the other reviewers are not having the same excellent experience that I am having with my Voice camera. The installation was easy, the image is clear and the directional live audio feature that they have, works great. When I video caht with my friend, he says that the image is clear and the frame rates are fine. Also, if there are others around, the directional live audio feature only picks up my voice. The software bundle is very good compared to the other cameras out there. Overall, I'm very happy with my camera and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Video Fan

customer_reviews.title: Lack of focus
customer_reviews.text: After hours of trying to figure out how to focus we have given up and ditching this camera. Since this model only has auto focus there is no way to adjust it manually. We tried calling techincal support and they were no help because we cannot see a serial number so we can send it in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Mic OK but picture quality lacks
customer_reviews.text: Liked the built in microphone. The zoom and pan features are nice. Unfortunately the video and still picture quality is poor. Probably will toss when another "good" deal comes along.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Good video quality with a little fisheye
customer_reviews.text: I only use the video portion of the camera and use cell phone for audio, so I haven't tested the audio aspects. The video quality is very good, although it does tend to have a fisheye effect that is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I like the webcam alot, but I am a little disappointed with the resolution. I figured it would have been more clear since it claims to be 7.0 megapixel.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F. Stinemetz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Received the product in tact.... good product, no problem installing the software. Can consider to purchase, but definitely not for the full price!
customer_reviews.author: Amit Vali

customer_reviews.title: Works okay.
customer_reviews.text: Not totally impressed with how the cam works. A little slow and choppy and had to reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: Vince S.

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Its good with its result and quality is fine, Easy to install and use. The only problem is , its hard to attach it on the laptop , because of it usually fell because of the loose grip.
customer_reviews.author: Ha_B

customer_reviews.title: Not work with D-Link wireless adapter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one, and return on the same day since it does not work with my wireless D-Link USB 2.0 network adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Hulinning2

product_meta.title: Creative Live! Cam with Voice
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer You can now sound your best with Creative Live! Cam Voice and its revolutionary Directional Live! Audio Technology. Integrated Adaptive Array Microphones and Directional Live! Audio blocks out almost all unwanted surrounding noise, so all you hear is your voice -- and nothing else. Live! Cam Voice's advanced CMOS sensor and high quality ultra-wide angle lens lets you capture large 1.3-megapixel videos, and snaps up to 5-megapixel photos!

 

Sound Your Best
Live! Audio technology reduces background noise and lets you transmit crystal clear voice. If you are in an extremely noisy environment, Directional Live! Audio and the Adaptive Array microphones work to eliminate noise even further, by removing ambient noise outside the webcam's field of view. High quality 1.3-megapixel sensor
Capture high definition videos at true 1.3 megapixels easily. You can also take amazing photos at up to 5.0 megapixels with software enhancement. Ultra wide-angle lens
The high quality glass lens gives you an amazing 85˚ field of view. So the camera allows more people in the video frame at any one time. Look Your Best
Enjoy smooth, vibrant video and sharp images with Live! View technology. Live! Cam Voice features a 1.3-megapixel sensor, intelligent auto exposure, and high quality glass lens. Smart Face Tracking, 4x digital zoom
With Smart Face Tracking activated, the camera automatically follows you as you move about, keeping you within the video always. It even tracks multiple persons, so everyone can get in on the conversation. Certified high-speed USB 2.0
Experience smooth, full-motion digital video streams and top-quality images. Live! Cam Voice is also USB 1.1 compliant, which means it is perfectly compatible with your computer even if your PC has a lower USB connection. Creative Software Suite
Do more with Creative Software Suite! Edit and organize your photos easily, create fun photo calendars - the possibilities are virtually endless. Take video messaging to a whole new level with Advanced Video FX! Entertain and experiment with many different video effects from multiple effect categories. Included SightSpeed Orb software (for North American customers only)
Maximize your webcam experience with these great software included at no extra charge. Turn your PC into a video phone, make multi-party video calls (available with paid SightSpeed plans), and even stream photos and videos to Web-enabled devices like laptops, PDAs and mobile phones. Muvee autoProducer
Create videos easily and quickly! Its fantastic video editing technology enables you to produce professional videos in an amazingly short period of time. Simply shoot it, muvee it and share it! Creative Headset
Use the included Creative handsfree headset to chat in private whenever necessary. Superior Video for Instant Messaging!
Live! Cam Voice works with Yahoo!® Messenger, Skype, MSN Messenger and other compatible instant messaging services. Multi-Attach Base
Attach Live! Cam Voice to almost anything - notebook displays, CRT monitors, Flat panel displays. Or let it rest comfortably on tables or other flat surfaces.  What's in the Box
Creative Live! Cam Voice with USB 2.0 cable, Creative hands free headset, Quick Start guide, and CD software containing Creative WebCam Center with Advanced Video FX, Creative Photo Manager, Creative Photo Calendar, muvee autoProducer, SightSpeed, Orb with OrbSecure, Yahoo! Messenger, and complete user's guide.
feature_bullets: Webcam delivers unrivalled voice and video clarity
Directional array microphone eliminates unwanted noise
High-quality, 1.3 megapixel sensor delivers true 1.3 megapixel video at 30 frames per second
Smart-face tracking keeps you in the video frame and high-speed 2.0 connectivity delivers smooth 640x480 resolution
Bundled Muvee autoProducer lets you create videos easily and quickly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars27 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
